hieros

human origins

Proto-Indo-Europeans left stong linguistic marks by calling their mothers â€˜motaâ€™ or similar anywhere in the world. Pharaos calling their mother â€œMutâ€ is no coincidence as should become clearly evident. Connections to semitic languages are no contradiction: It is easy to understand Old Egyptian as related to both Semitic and Hamitic languages via manifold cultural and actual intermarriages.

Every single letter in Alphabet of Egyptian hieroglyphs left a tremendous linguistic footprint on all surrounding countries.

But other icons are highly recognizable as well:
